description: Stores information about the user's saving goals, including progress, priority, status, and deadlines.

columns.goal_id: CHAR(36) – Unique identifier for the goal (PRIMARY KEY), defaults to UUID()
columns.user_id: CHAR(36) – References users(user_id), ON DELETE CASCADE
columns.goal_name: VARCHAR(255) – Name of the goal (e.g., 'Buy a house', 'Trip to Japan')
columns.target_amount: NUMERIC(15,2) – Target amount to be saved, must be > 0
columns.current_amount: NUMERIC(15,2) – Current amount saved, must be ≥ 0, defaults to 0.00
columns.target_date: DATE – Deadline to achieve the goal
columns.weight: NUMERIC(5,2) – Percentage of the user’s monthly income allocated to this goal’s jar (auto-calculated for active goals)
columns.status: INTEGER – Status of the goal (0: Pause, 1: Active, 2: Completed)
columns.eta_lock: BOOLEAN – Whether the initial_target_date is locked, defaults to FALSE
columns.initial_target_date: DATE – Initial deadline (used to evaluate delays or advances)
columns.sent_money: BOOLEAN – Whether the money has been disbursed, defaults to FALSE
columns.created_at: TIMESTAMP – Record creation timestamp, defaults to CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
columns.updated_at: TIMESTAMP – Last update timestamp, defaults to CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
